name: old-amber
effect: Give to a scientist in the mining museum in oreburgh city or the Museum of Science in pewter city to receive an aerodactyl.
short_effect: Can be revived into an Aerodactyl.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A piece of amber that still contains the genetic material of an ancient Pokémon. It’s clear with a tawny, reddish tint.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A piece of amber that still contains the genetic material of an ancient Pokémon. It’s clear with a tawny, reddish tint.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A piece of amber that still contains the genetic material of an ancient Pokémon. It’s clear with a tawny, reddish tint.
